About me

With a background in competition, I am a growth-minded person always eager to improve myself in all areas. Having discovered the world of logic and programming and the endless amount of challenges to solve and skills to develop, I have found a calling and passion in full stack web development and programming. The unique combination of creativity, logic, technology and never running out of new things to discover, drives my excitement and passion for web development. My hobbies include athleticism, competition and reading.
